# tf.keras.backend.greater

Element-wise truth value of (x > y).

### Aliases:

* `tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.greater`
* `tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.greater`


``` python
tf.keras.backend.greater(
    x,
    y
)
```

#### Arguments:


* <b>`x`</b>: Tensor or variable.
* <b>`y`</b>: Tensor or variable.


#### Returns:

A bool tensor.
